description: Images that I took during the April 8, 2024 Solar Eclipse over Shawnee National Forest.

flower_2.title: Purple Flowers
flower_2.caption: Ever wonder why violet light appears purple?

totality.title: Totality
totality.caption: I'm still blown away that I was able to get this shot.

partial.title: Partial Solar Eclipse
partial.caption: Bye sun, we'll see you soon, at least I hope ...

tree.title: Partial Eclipse with Tree
tree.caption: What is a tree doing here?
